import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import * as ROUTES from '../../constants/routesConstants'; function ProductItem({ product, isAdmin, addCart, deleteProduct }) { return (
{ isAdmin && }

{product.title}

${product.price}

{product.description}

{ isAdmin ? <>
deleteProduct(product._id, product.images.public_id)} > Delete Edit
: <>
addCart(product)} > Buy View
}
) } export default ProductItem
